TreatyText.Label: Text
TreatyText.Text: United Nations, Treaty Series , vol. 2688, p. 39; depositary notification C.N.776.2008.TREATIES-2 of 10 Nov 2008

TreatyNote.Text: The Convention was concluded by the Dublin Diplomatic Conference on Cluster Munitions at Dublin on 30 May 2008. In accordance with its article 15, the Convention was opened for signature at Oslo, Norway, by all States on 3 December 2008 and will remain open thereafter at the United Nations Headquarters in New York until its entry into force.
